verses.verse: Now <WG1161> of <WG1909> the things which we have spoken <WG3004> this is the sum <WG2774>: We have <WG2192> such <WG5108> an high priest <WG749>, who <WG3739> is set <WG2523> on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the throne <WG2362> of the Majesty <WG3172> in <WG1722> the heavens <WG3772>;

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> <WG3303> he were <WG2258> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093>, he should <WG302> not <WG3761> be <WG2258> a priest <WG2409>, seeing that there are <WG5607> priests <WG2409> that offer <WG4374> gifts <WG1435> according <WG2596> to the law <WG3551>: there: or, they are priests

Who <WG3748> serve <WG3000> unto the example <WG5262> and <WG2532> shadow <WG4639> of heavenly things <WG2032>, as <WG2531> Moses <WG3475> was admonished of God <WG5537> when he was about <WG3195> to make <WG2005> the tabernacle <WG4633>: for <WG1063>, See <WG3708>, saith he <WG5346>, that thou make <WG4160> all things <WG3956> according to <WG2596> the pattern <WG5179> shewed <WG1166> to thee <WG4671> in <WG1722> the mount <WG3735>.

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> hath he obtained <WG5177> a more excellent <WG1313> ministry <WG3009>, by how much <WG3745> also <WG2532> he is <WG2076> the mediator <WG3316> of a better <WG2909> covenant <WG1242>, which <WG3748> was established <WG3549> upon <WG1909> better <WG2909> promises <WG1860>. covenant: or, testament
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> that <WG1565> first <WG4413> covenant had been <WG2258> faultless <WG273>, then should <WG302> no <WG3756> place <WG5117> have been sought <WG2212> for the second <WG1208>.

For <WG1063> finding fault <WG3201> with them <WG846>, he saith <WG3004>, Behold <WG2400>, the days <WG2250> come <WG2064>, saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>, when <WG2532> I will make <WG4931> a new <WG2537> covenant <WG1242> with <WG1909> the house <WG3624> of Israel <WG2474> and <WG2532> with <WG1909> the house <WG3624> of Judah <WG2455>:

Not <WG3756> according to <WG2596> the covenant <WG1242> that <WG3739> I made with <WG4160> their <WG846> fathers <WG3962> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> when I took <WG1949> them <WG846> by the hand <WG3450> <WG5495> to lead <WG1806> them <WG846> out of <WG1537> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>; because <WG3754> they <WG846> continued <WG1696> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> covenant <WG1242>, and I <WG2504> regarded <WG272> them <WG846> not <WG272>, saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>.

For <WG3754> this <WG3778> is the covenant <WG1242> that <WG3739> I will make <WG1303> with the house <WG3624> of Israel <WG2474> after <WG3326> those <WG1565> days <WG2250>, saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>; I will put <WG1325> my <WG3450> laws <WG3551> into <WG1519> their <WG846> mind <WG1271>, and <WG2532> write <WG1924> them <WG846> in <WG1909> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588>: and <WG2532> I will be <WG2071> to <WG1519> them <WG846> a God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> they <WG846> shall be <WG2071> to <WG1519> me <WG3427> a people <WG2992>: put: Gr. give in: or, upon

For <WG3754> I will be <WG2071> merciful <WG2436> to their <WG846> unrighteousness <WG93>, and <WG2532> their <WG846> sins <WG266> and <WG2532> their <WG846> iniquities <WG458> will I remember <WG3415> no <WG3364> more <WG2089>.
